metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25657 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in all released versions of m2crypto, where they are vulnerable to Bleichenbacher timing attacks in the RSA decryption API via the timed processing of valid PKCS#1 v1.5 Ciphertext. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to confidentiality.

criterions.comment: m2crypto package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
